thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: GREER

author: GREER
title: GREER
text:
As a single female without a great support network, having Lube Mobile come to my work was convenient and stress free.
The professional and friendly service I received was amazing, something completely different to what I've gotten at dealerships in the past - so refreshing!
Everything about my service and the check that the mechanic did on my car was explained to me in detail and I actually understood it!
Will be using Lube Mobile for all of my servicing and repair needs from now on!
